Name: PageLikes
Description: Defines the popularity or support for the source of the document.

Name: PageCheckins
Description: Describes how many individuals so far visited this place. This feature is only associated with the places eg:some institution, place, theater etc.

Name: PageTalkingAbout
Description: Defines the daily interest of individuals towards source of the document/ Post. The people who actually come back to the page, after liking the page. This include activities such as comments, likes to a post, shares, etc by visitors to the page.

Name: PageCategory
Description: Defines the category of the source of the document eg: place, institution, brand etc.

Name: CC1
Description: The total number of comments before selected base date/time.

Name: CC2
Description: The number of comments in last 24 hours, relative to base date/time.

Name: CC3
Description: The number of comments in last 48 to last 24 hours relative to base date/time.

Name: CC4
Description: The number of comments in the first 24 hours after the publication of post but before base date/time.

Name: CC5
Description: The difference between CC2 and CC3.

Name: Basetime
Description: Selected time in order to simulate the scenario.

Name: Postlength
Description: Character count in the post.

Name: PostShareCount
Description: This features counts the no of shares of the post, that how many peoples had shared this post on to their timeline.

Name: PostPromotionStatus
Description: To reach more people with posts in News Feed, individual promote their post and this features tells that whether the post is promoted(1) or not(0).

Name: HLocal
Description: This describes the H hrs, for which we have the target variable/ comments received.

Name: SundayPublished
Description: This represents the day(Sunday...Saturday) on which the post was published.

Name: MondayPublished
Description: This represents the day(Sunday...Saturday) on which the post was published.

Name: TargetVariable
Description: The no of comments in next H hrs(H is given in Feature no 39).
